paper_abstract: We present a reduction from the Pigeon-Hole Principle to the classical Sperner Lemma. The reduction is used 1. to show that the Sperner Lemma does not have a short constant-depth Frege proof, and 2. to prove lower bounds on the Query Complexity of the Sperner Lemma in the Black-Box model of Computation.
paper_title: On the complexity of the Sperner Lemma
